code: import React from'react';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{DragDropContext}from'react-beautiful-dnd';import Column from'./Column';import{updateTaskStatus}from'../features/tasks/tasksSlice';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const columns={todo:'To Do',inprogress:'In Progress',peerreview:'Peer Review',done:'Done'};const Board=()=>{const tasks=useSelector(state=>state.tasks.tasks);const searchQuery=useSelector(state=>state.tasks.searchQuery);const dispatch=useDispatch();const onDragEnd=result=>{if(!result.destination)return;dispatch(updateTaskStatus({id:result.draggableId,status:result.destination.droppableId}));};const filteredTasks=tasks.filter(task=>task.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DragDropContext,{onDragEnd:onDragEnd,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"board",children:Object.entries(columns).map(_ref=>{let[columnId,columnName]=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Column,{columnId:columnId,columnName:columnName,tasks:filteredTasks.filter(task=>task.status===columnId)},columnId);})})});};export default Board;
